text: Andrew Thompson was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland West End F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Queens Park Rangers F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Andy Thompson (footballer, born in Sunderland)
